title: Day 1
text:
It’s a whole new exciting world! And the default project has a lot of exciting files to explore.
I’m using:

https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-blog.html
https://albert-rapp.de/posts/13_quarto_blog_writing_guide/13_quarto_blog_writing_guide.html

title: Day 1
text:
Example
Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: Day 1
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

1 + 1

[1] 2


You can add options to executable code like this


[1] 4


The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).

title: Day 2
text:
I’m really interested in building a RSS reader in R/Quarto.
What is RSS? It stands for “Really Simple Syndication” and is a web feed for content being added to websites in a standardized way.
rss_feeds examples: - “https://appsilon.com/rss” - “https://blog.rstudio.com/index.xml” - “https://www.r-bloggers.com/feed/” - “http://www.hackaday.com/rss.xml”
So much code out there to refer to:

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51762965/getting-rss-feed-in-r-shiny-web-app
https://community.rstudio.com/t/shinyfeed-shiny-contest-submission/104723
https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-blog.html
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/27772079/how-to-consume-streaming-xml-rss-feeds-with-r
https://www.cdata.com/kb/tech/rss-jdbc-r.rst
https://www.r-bloggers.com/2021/11/rss-feeds-of-package-updates-in-r-universe/
https://www.r-bloggers.com/2016/08/feeder-reading-rss-and-atom-feeds-from-r/
https://rss.app/blog/how-to-add-auto-updated-news-feeds-to-your-website-6KP2RL
https://www.lifewire.com/what-is-an-rss-feed-4684568
https://medium.com/samsung-internet-dev/add-rss-feeds-to-your-website-to-keep-your-core-readers-engaged-3179dca9c91e
https://www.feedforall.com/displaying-rss.htm
https://rhodygarden.org/sitehelp-show-rss-feed-in-ie/
https://medium.com/@spians/how-to-get-rss-feed-of-popular-websites-c5cb2af83d71
https://www.r-bloggers.com/2019/12/creating-an-rss-feed-to-add-your-jekyll-github-pages-blog-to-r-bloggers/
https://www.w3schools.com/xml/xml_rss.asp
https://github.com/rstudio/distill/issues/33
https://blog.ouseful.info/2017/06/28/hexjson-htmlwidget-for-r-part-1/
https://www.r-bloggers.com/2011/04/how-to-build-a-dataset-in-r-using-an-rss-feed-or-web-page/
https://github.com/noahhl/r-does-rss
https://datawookie.github.io/feedeR/index.html
https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-listings-custom.html
https://blog.djnavarro.net/posts/2022-04-20_porting-to-quarto/
https://www.r-bloggers.com/2022/07/how-to-set-up-quarto-with-docker-part-1-static-content/

Alternatively a program like feedly could be used on a local device (not sure about integration with quarto).

title: Day 3
text: Retracted science papers. Particularly with the engaging way the stories are told on For Better Science.

title: Day 3
text:
The rabbit hole started with:

Sylvain Lesné is a failed scientist: https://forbetterscience.com/2022/07/27/silvain-lesne-is-a-failed-scientist/
Cassava fraud and Alzheimer’s capitalism: https://forbetterscience.com/2021/12/15/cassava-fraud-and-alzheimers-capitalism/

title: Day 4
text:
My first AI art generating app (5 free pieces of art per day): https://www.starryai.com/
Images in : img/starryai/

Doesn’t require log in (5 free pieces of art per day, however using incognito mode or edge counts as a separate user for 15 pieces of art per day): https://creator.nightcafe.studio/
Images in : img/nightcafe
     
There are a bunch more I’m looking forward to trying: https://www.unite.ai/10-best-ai-art-generators/#:~:text=Another%20one%20of%20the%20best,trained%20with%20millions%20of%20images
Tips on dealing with displaying images in a rendered document: https://rpubs.com/RatherBit/90926

title: Day 5
text:
A fun (and free game) where you are an AI exploring space trying to find the new home for the 1000 remaining survivors of the human race stored onboard.
Link: https://philome.la/johnayliff/seedship/play/index.html
